name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a seasoned Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of comprehensive experience, I am proficient in **C#.NET**, **multithreading**, and **Test Driven Development (TDD)**. I have a solid understanding of **Git** for version control and possess expertise in **SQL** for database management, ensuring efficient data storage and retrieval. My experience encompasses **Docker** for containerization, enabling seamless application deployment, and I am well-versed in Linux environments, enhancing system performance and reliability. I have successfully contributed to projects involving **Distributed services** and have hands-on experience with **Agile** methodologies to foster effective team collaboration.

In addition to the required skills, I also possess extensive full-stack development experience utilizing **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. My cloud expertise spans **Azure** and **AWS**, coupled with a strong foundation in **microservices architecture**, **event-driven systems**, and **CI/CD automation**, which have been instrumental in building robust and secure applications. I have designed and implemented enterprise-grade platforms integrating AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics and intelligent automation, and I am adept at developing machine learning pipelines and MLOps workflows using frameworks such as **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. My commitment to quality aligns with compliance standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2.
